name: Battle Of The Nevada Desert (Preview)
description:
This game runs natively on both Intel and Apple Silicon Macs and is optimised for Metal.

Important: This game is so far an EARLY PREVIEW, so there aren't any enemies or guns yet. But I'm currently working on them and it should be done very soon. But feel free to roam around the map and explore the buildings!

You, a spy, have been tasked with destroying a military camp in the Nevada desert.

If you fail your mission, the entire world could be at stake. Can you defeat the base? Or will the entire world go dark?
